Enter your vote today!  A new poll has been created for the 
nbwrpg group:

How often do you check that this RPG 
has new posts? 

  o Every 2 hours 
  o Every 3 - 4 hours 
  o Every time that I have a chance 
  o Once a day 
  o Twice times for day 
  o Every 2 - 4 Days 
  o Every 5 -6 Days 
  o Once a week 
  o Once two weeks 
  o I check it once in three weeks 


To vote, please visit the following web page:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/nbwrpg/surveys?id=997582  

Note: Please do not reply to this message. Poll votes are 
not collected via email. To vote, you must go to the Yahoo! Groups 
web site listed above.

Thanks!
